resources.string: Final Attendance: 40% \nPoor attendance
Final Attendance: 60% \nYou should have turned up for more class
Final Attendance: 80% \nWonderful attendance
Final Attendance: 100% \nPerfect attendance!
Final Grade: 0% \nTerrible result. A lot more study needed
Final Grade: 10% \nFailed. You should have studied.
Final Grade: 20% \nNot good enough! You\'ve failed!
Final Grade: 30% \nHow upsetting. Do well next time. Failed.
Final Grade: 40% \nYou\'ve barely passed.
Final Grade: 50% \nMore study should be done. You\'ve passed.
Final Grade: 60% \nYou could do better but you pass.
Final Grade: 70% \nDo a bit more study but you\'ve passed.
Final Grade: 80% \nA very good result!
Final Grade: 90% \nI\'m impressed. An outstanding grade!
Final Grade: 100% \nWow! A programming genius! Excellent result!
I\'m sorry, but due to your poor grades and attendance, I cannot give you a reference for your CV
Your attendance has been great, but I\'m afraid your grades are not good enough for a reference from me
I wish I could give you a reference, but I\'m afraid your grades and attendance just aren\'t good enough
Your final grades are wonderful. However, your attendance is so poor that I cannot give you a reference
Despite your poor attendance, I will give you a reference due to your perfect grade
I wouldn\'t usually give a reference for a mark this low, but since your attendance is so good, I will
Wonderful marks and wonderful attendance! Of course I\'ll give you a reference!
